sentences.sContent: I sympathize with the introvert as I would with the sickly, but both are missing a lot of life.
sentences.sContent_eng: I sympathize with the introvert as I would with the sickly, but both are missing a lot of life.
sentences.sCn: 我会像体谅体弱病残的人那样，体谅性格内向的人，但两者都失去许多人生体验。

sentences.sContent: Introverts can have friends ok. I mean, I'm an introvert and I have no friends, but some do. Maybe. Not sure actually.
sentences.sContent_eng: Introverts can have friends ok. I mean, I'm an introvert and I have no friends, but some do. Maybe. Not sure actually.
sentences.sCn: 内向的人也可以拥有朋友，嗯，我说的是，我是一个内向的人我没有朋友，但是很多内向人也有朋友。是这样的吧？也许是吧？

sentences.sContent: Many colleges will help future career seekers to evaluate self- personality to see if they are introvert, extrovert, detail-oriented or concept / idea persons.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many colleges will help future career seekers to evaluate self- personality to see if they are introvert, extrovert, detail-oriented or concept / idea persons.
sentences.sCn: 许多大学帮助未来的求职者估量自己性格是否属于内向、外向、倾向细节或有创造性的人。

remMethod.val: intro (向内) + vert (转) → 向内弯曲

words.tran: 使...内向（introvert的过去分词形式）；使内翻

trans.tranOther: someone who is quiet and shy, and does not enjoy being with other people
